Articles.Content:
I was just sitting around on the forums like i do in my spare time sometimes and noticed that it has been a complete year since i joined the forms.

and in that whole time I have made almost no posts and have never posted an introduction.

Ive had lots of fun playing KSP for the past year and a half or so I have played it and I look forward to many more years of enjoyment of this game.

I joined a year or so ago but only really started posting in the last few months

Anyway welcome to the forums!
Well, I guess that makes you the top of the list on the active user list as oldest and with least posts! I hope you enjoy being back on the forums! If you ever need any advice in KSP, let me know!
